headline.main: Robert McGinnis, 73, Founder Of Sociology Center at Cornell

lead_paragraph: Robert McGinnis, a Cornell University sociologist who founded and directed its Institute for Social and Economic Research, died Feb. 22 at a hospice in Ithaca, N.Y. He was 73 and lived in Ithaca. He suffered a brief illness, his family said.
abstract: Robert McGinnis, founder of Cornell's Institute for Social and Economic Research, dies at age 73; photo (M)
snippet: Robert McGinnis, a Cornell University sociologist who founded and directed its Institute for Social and Economic Research, died Feb. 22 at a hospice in Ithaca, N.Y. He was 73 and lived in Ithaca.    He suffered a brief illness, his family said....
